Harness is on a mission to create beautiful recruitment experiences for candidate, client and recruiter, offering never before seen benefits to all involved. It combines both Artificial Intelligence algorithm and the skills of experienced recruiters and allows to hire qualified talent that meets clients needs.

WHAT TYPE OF PROJECT WORKS BEST FOR YOU?

AGILE PROJECT

For complex projects with full customization and unique design
  • Flexible development process
  • Fixed price billing
  • Delivered in 3-5 weeks
  • Dedicated Project Manager
  • Pay by milestone

10-DAY EXPRESS

Fastest time to market for only$7500
  • Minimum Viable Product.
  • 10 day development cycle.
  • Dedicated Project Manager.
  • Streamlined Process
  • fixed rate.
  • Minimum Viable Product.
  • 10 day development cycle.
  • Low flat rate.
  • Dedicated Project Manager.
  • Streamlined Process
